Proudly FLOSS (Free, Libre, Open Source Software)

Bonfire is libre and open source software. This means that you can use and modify Bonfire without asking permission from anyone. Plus, you can benefit from future developments by anyone improving the codebase: any upgrades, changes, or additions to Bonfire apps and extensions will always be freely available to users due to our AGPL license.
